amendment.description: Amendment establishes an Office of Energy Employment and Training to ensure that veterans, women, and underrepresented minorities are fully included in the hiring and training efforts of the Department of the Interior's energy planning, permitting, and regulatory agencies.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 9 printed in House Report 113-493 to establish an Office of Energy Employment and Training to ensure that veterans, women, and underrepresented minorities are fully included in the hiring and training efforts of the Department of the Interior's energy planning, permitting, and regulatory agencies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A009) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
